001/*

004 */
005
006package gov.nist.secauto.oscal.lib.profile.resolver.selection;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
009import gov.nist.secauto.oscal.lib.model.IncludeAll;
010import gov.nist.secauto.oscal.lib.model.ProfileImport;
011import gov.nist.secauto.oscal.lib.model.control.catalog.IControl;
012import gov.nist.secauto.oscal.lib.model.control.profile.IProfileSelectControlById;
013
014import org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.Pair;
015
016import java.util.List;
017
018import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
019
020public interface IControlFilter {
021  @NonNull
022  IControlFilter ALWAYS_MATCH = new IControlFilter() {
023    @Override
024    public @NonNull Pair<Boolean, Boolean> match(@NonNull IControl control, boolean defaultMatch) {
025      return IControlSelectionFilter.MATCH;
026    }
027
028    @Override
029    public @NonNull IControlSelectionFilter getInclusionFilter() {
030      return IControlSelectionFilter.ALL_MATCH;
031    }
032
033    @Override
034    public @NonNull IControlSelectionFilter getExclusionFilter() {
035      return IControlSelectionFilter.NONE_MATCH;
036    }
037  };
038
039  @NonNull
040  IControlFilter NONE_MATCH = new IControlFilter() {
041
042    @Override
043    public @NonNull Pair<Boolean, Boolean> match(@NonNull IControl control, boolean defaultMatch) {
044      return IControlSelectionFilter.NON_MATCH;
045    }
046
047    @Override
048    public @NonNull IControlSelectionFilter getInclusionFilter() {
049      return IControlSelectionFilter.NONE_MATCH;
050    }
051
052    @Override
053    public @NonNull IControlSelectionFilter getExclusionFilter() {
054      return IControlSelectionFilter.NONE_MATCH;
055    }
056  };
057
058  /**
059   * Construct a new filter instance based on the provided profile import
060   * statement.
061   *
062   * @param profileImport
063   *          an OSCAL profile import statement
064   * @return a new control filter
065   */
066  @NonNull
067  static IControlFilter newInstance(@NonNull ProfileImport profileImport) {
068    return new Filter(profileImport);
069  }
070
071  @NonNull
072  static IControlFilter newInstance(@NonNull IControlSelectionFilter includes,
073      @NonNull IControlSelectionFilter excludes) {
074    return new Filter(includes, excludes);
075  }
076
077  /**
078   * Determines if the control is matched by this filter. This method returns a
079   * {@link Pair} where the first member of the pair indicates if the control
080   * matches, and the second indicates if the match applies to child controls as
081   * well.
082   *
083   * @param control
084   *          the control to check for a match
085   * @return a pair indicating the status of the match ({@code true} for a match
086   *         or {@code false} otherwise), and if a match applies to child controls
087   */
088  @NonNull
089  default Pair<Boolean, Boolean> match(@NonNull IControl control) {
090    return match(control, false);
091  }
092
093  /**
094   * Determines if the control is matched by this filter. This method returns a
095   * {@link Pair} where the first member of the pair indicates if the control
096   * matches, and the second indicates if the match applies to child controls as
097   * well.
098   *
099   * @param control
100   *          the control to check for a match
101   * @param defaultMatch
102   *          the match status to use if the filter doesn't have an explicit hit
103   * @return a pair indicating the status of the match ({@code true} for a match
104   *         or {@code false} otherwise), and if a match applies to child controls
105   */
106  @NonNull
107  Pair<Boolean, Boolean> match(@NonNull IControl control, boolean defaultMatch);
108
109  @NonNull
110  IControlSelectionFilter getInclusionFilter();
111
112  @NonNull
113  IControlSelectionFilter getExclusionFilter();
114
115  class Filter implements IControlFilter {
116    @NonNull
117    private final IControlSelectionFilter inclusionFilter;
118    @NonNull
119    private final IControlSelectionFilter exclusionFilter;
120
121    public Filter(@NonNull ProfileImport profileImport) {
122      IncludeAll includeAll = profileImport.getIncludeAll();
123
124      if (includeAll == null) {
125        List<? extends IProfileSelectControlById> selections = profileImport.getIncludeControls();
126        if (selections == null) {
127          this.inclusionFilter = IControlSelectionFilter.NONE_MATCH;
128        } else {
129          this.inclusionFilter = new DefaultControlSelectionFilter(selections);
130        }
131      } else {
132        this.inclusionFilter = IControlSelectionFilter.ALL_MATCH;
133      }
134
135      List<? extends IProfileSelectControlById> selections = profileImport.getExcludeControls();
136      if (selections == null) {
137        this.exclusionFilter = IControlSelectionFilter.NONE_MATCH;
138      } else {
139        this.exclusionFilter = new DefaultControlSelectionFilter(selections);
140      }
141
142    }
143
144    public Filter(@NonNull IControlSelectionFilter includes, @NonNull IControlSelectionFilter excludes) {
145      this.inclusionFilter = includes;
146      this.exclusionFilter = excludes;
147    }
148
149    @Override
150    @NonNull
151    public IControlSelectionFilter getInclusionFilter() {
152      return inclusionFilter;
153    }
154
155    @Override
156    @NonNull
157    public IControlSelectionFilter getExclusionFilter() {
158      return exclusionFilter;
159    }
160
161    @Override
162    public Pair<Boolean, Boolean> match(@NonNull IControl control, boolean defaultMatch) {
163      @NonNull Pair<Boolean, Boolean> result = getInclusionFilter().apply(control);
164      boolean left = ObjectUtils.notNull(result.getLeft());
165      if (left) {
166        // this is a positive include match. Is it excluded?
167        Pair<Boolean, Boolean> excluded = getExclusionFilter().apply(control);
168        if (ObjectUtils.notNull(excluded.getLeft())) {
169          // the effective result is a non-match
170          result = IControlSelectionFilter.NON_MATCH;
171        }
172      } else {
173        result = defaultMatch ? IControlSelectionFilter.MATCH : IControlSelectionFilter.NON_MATCH;
174      }
175      return result;
176    }
177
178  }
179
180}
